candidateA.name: Mark Carney
candidateA.summary: Mark Carney's education-related promise centers on affordable childcare. He commits to maintaining and expanding the existing $10 a day childcare program.

candidateB.name: Pierre Poilievre
candidateB.summary: Pierre Poilievre's education promises focus on skilled trades and language learning. He pledges to reinstate a $4,000 apprenticeship grant and fund 350,000 more training spots, while also expanding French immersion programs.
